decision_conditions: Due to their size, front elevation position and cumulative impact,  the proposed dormers would be an uncharacteristic form of development in the locality, cramping and cluttering the roof of the terrace and harming the appearance of the area, contrary to Policy BE1 of the  Local Plan: Part 1 - Strategic Policies and Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12 and DMHD 1 of the Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020), as well as Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and paragraph 130 of the NPPF (2021).

The decision to REFUSE planning permission has been taken having regard to all relevant planning legislation, regulations, guidance, circulars and Council policies, including The Human Rights Act (1998) (HRA 1998) which makes it unlawful for the Council to act incompatibly with Convention rights, specifically Article 6 (right to a fair hearing); Article 8 (right to respect for private and family life); Article 1 of the First Protocol (protection of property) and Article 14 (prohibition of discrimination).

The decision to REFUSE planning permission has been taken having regard to the policies and proposals in the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020) set out below, including Supplementary Planning Guidance, and to all relevant material considerations, including The London Plan (2021) and NPPF (2021).
description: Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref. 45882/APP/2023/948, dated 25-05-2023 (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref. 45882/APP/2022/1591, dated 27-01-2023 (Creation of 2 no. dwellings, involving the erection of a single storey rear extensions, porches and a two storey side extension. Conversion of roof space to habitable use including three rear dormers, raising the ridge line of roof, three Juliette balconies, front rooflights and fenestration alterations with associated landscaping and parking.) to amend the roof layout to single storey rear extensions and ridge height of one dwelling) to alter roof layout to include front dormers
